sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './App.css' class App extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { height: "", weight: "", result: "" } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { event.preventDefault() this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } //bmi function// /* let newHeight = parseFloat(height / 100) let bmi = weight / (newHeight * newHeight) */ render() { return (

BMI Calculator

Height (95cm-220cm)


Weight (10kg-300kg)



Result

Your BMI is: {this.state.result}

) } } export default App
